about.description: I'm Sandra, an illustrator and artist living near Venice. I work with watercolor, collage, and traditional techniques, sometimes blending them with digital media. Iâ€™m drawn to what is imperfect, tactile, and delicate in quiet contrast to an increasingly uniform and generated visual landscape.

info.services: Original artworks, Editorial and Commercial illustrations, Courses and workshops
